name: Sparks Of Light
description:
Wield the Sparks of Light to pass the perilous trial that lies ahead of you! These Sparks are your only offense and defense, sacrifice them at your own risk! As a Spark wielder, you are able to control the mystical Sparks of Light at your own free will. These sparks are your greatest offense, and your greatest defense. However, they are not resilient, and will dissipate after being hit. Can you keep yourself alive along with your Sparks of Light? Or will you sacrifice them to protect yourself? This game was made in 3 days for the 46th Ludum Dare Game Jam. The theme for this Jam was 'Keep it Alive'. Credits:
